Gold.en: An attack that may lower SPEED.

Silver.en: An attack that may lower SPEED.

Crystal.en: An attack that may lower SPEED.

Ruby.en: Constricts to inflict pain. May lower SPEED.

Sapphire.en: Constricts to inflict pain. May lower SPEED.

Emerald.en: Constricts to inflict pain. May lower SPEED.

FireRed.en: The foe is attacked with long tentacles or vines. It may lower SPEED.
FireRed.de: Angriff mit langen Tentakeln oder Ranken. Senkt evtl. INIT.-Wert.

LeafGreen.en: The foe is attacked with long tentacles or vines. It may lower SPEED.
LeafGreen.de: Angriff mit langen Tentakeln oder Ranken. Senkt evtl. INIT.-Wert.

Diamond.en: The foe is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target’s Speed.
Diamond.de: Angriff mit langen Tentakeln o. Ranken. Senkt eventuell Initiative-Wert.
